name: Canberra Vikings Rugby Union
tagline: Unleashing the Spirit of Rugby in Canberra
description: The Canberra Vikings Rugby Union team is dedicated to promoting the sport of rugby in the Canberra region. With a commitment to excellence on and off the field, we provide coaching for all ages and skill levels while fostering a strong sense of community and sportsmanship.

content.heading: Welcome to Canberra Vikings Rugby Union
content.paragraph: Join us in our quest for victory and glory, as we train hard and compete with passion. Our team is built on values of teamwork, respect, and integrity, ensuring every player feels at home.

content.heading: Latest News
content.paragraph: Stay updated with our latest fixtures, results, and announcements. Follow us on social media for real-time updates and engage with our community.

content.heading: Our Mission
content.paragraph: To foster a love for rugby in Canberra by providing quality coaching and competitive opportunities for all players.

content.heading: Our Values
content.paragraph: Teamwork, Respect, Integrity, Passion – these are the values that guide the Canberra Vikings Rugby Union team.

content.heading: History
content.paragraph: Founded in 2012, the Canberra Vikings Rugby Union team has quickly become known for its dedication to developing talent and building a community around rugby in the region.

content.heading: Upcoming Matches
content.paragraph: Check out our upcoming matches and support the team as we strive for victory.

content.heading: Results Archive
content.paragraph: Look back on our past matches and compare scores, player stats, and more.

content.heading: Players
content.paragraph: Meet our talented players who embody the spirit of the Canberra Vikings. Each player brings unique skills, passion, and dedication to the team.

content.heading: Coaches
content.paragraph: Our experienced coaching staff guides and mentors our players, ensuring they develop both as athletes and individuals.

content.heading: Become a Member
content.paragraph: We welcome players of all ages and skill levels. Sign up to join our club and become part of the Canberra Vikings family.

content.heading: Volunteer Opportunities
content.paragraph: Interested in supporting the team? We are always looking for volunteers to help with game day operations and more.

content.heading: Get In Touch
content.paragraph: Do you have questions? We'd love to hear from you!

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.text: Being part of the Canberra Vikings has been an incredible journey. The team spirit and camaraderie are unmatched!

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.text: I’ve seen my son grow not just as a player but as a person through the values taught at Canberra Vikings.

services.title: Coaching
services.description: We provide high-quality coaching to players of all skill levels, focusing on skill development and teamwork.

services.title: Community Events
services.description: Join us at our community events which bring together rugby fans and families for fun and learning.

footer.description: Canberra Vikings Rugby Union - Bringing together players, families, and fans to celebrate the great game of Rugby.
